background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">女士的除皱产</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">品对</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: &quot;Arial Unicode MS&quot;;">20</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">岁</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">是在为皮肤</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; <p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">每个人的皮肤都是不可复制的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">绝版</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的护肤品。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">正是在这样的需求趋势下，具有靶向性的精准护肤逐渐成为市场大势所趋，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">2023</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">年采之汲破局而出。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-align: justify;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">&nbsp;</span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-align: center;"> <strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: left; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; font-size: 21px;">年的科技</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: left; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); padding: 0px; text-align: left; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">“</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: left; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">更优解</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: left; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: left; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">？</span></strong></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">如果有这样一种护肤方式，你只需要在仪器前采集下脸部数据，就会</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">由</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">自动生成靶向性护肤解决方案，你会想要尝试吗？</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">相较于国际大牌，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">国产品牌</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">30</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">年来长期处于跟随者的位置，想要改变这种局面，需要以</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">不破不立</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的勇气重开新赛道，而采之汲的精准护肤正是如此。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">如何真正做到精准护肤？</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">在一个新科技时代，科技赋能是实现靶向性护肤的关键突破口</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">有业内人士指出。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">就像近期爆火的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">ChatGPT</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，人工智能为用户</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">量身定制</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">答案，与传统搜索引擎</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">需要用户在海量网页中手动筛选内容</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">比起来优势明显一样。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">采之汲，正借助</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">、大数据等高科技，用人工智能</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">算</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">出靶向性护肤，为爱美者提供精准定制护肤解决方案。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">在采之汲，你可以通过全球领先的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">肌肤诊疗个性化定制系统</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">MIS-UNIQ</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，在医学光源的深度扫描下，实现无创肌肤</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">横切面</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">成像</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">从而得到如黑色素含量、炎性因子分布等直观准确数据，还能结合皮肤学原理，对</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">80</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">余种肌肤问题进行动态的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">专家级解读</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> &nbsp;</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-align: center;"> <img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="3.png" src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2F62212614cedc9d26fe4e20120d178483&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; border: none; width: auto; max-width: 100%;" title="1678155849182973.png"></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">&nbsp;</span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">为何</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">MIS-UNIQ</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">能精准解读肌肤？</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">采之汲在这方面是下足了</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">‘</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">苦功夫</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">’</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的，专门针对中国女性开展了一场</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">‘</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">量肤工程</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">’</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">采之汲核心研发人员解释道。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">在这场针对全国的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">人脸普查</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">行动中，采之汲收集了百万级国人脸部肌肤数据，依托对海量数据的深度研究，实现了以</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">人工智能算法，破译每个人的肌肤专属</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">ID</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">采之汲的精准护肤，在产品成分上也是与众不同的！</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">采之汲核心研发人员表示。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">依托于云南白药对中国药植的研究，从中国特色植物着手，采之汲找到了专属中国药植的靶向性护肤解决方案。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">中国药植护肤历史悠久，一代女皇武则天就曾用</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">益母草</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">美容，而采之汲以现代科学对药植护肤成分进行了系统研究：</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">以三七为例，采之汲发现其总皂苷等核心成分可清除肌肤问题的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">万恶之源</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">自由基，从多个方面延缓衰老；</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">还能</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">抑制炎性因子，从而防治黑头、红血丝等肌肤问题；并加速胶原纤维形成让</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">薄</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">脸皮变</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">厚</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”……</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> &nbsp;</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-align: center;"> <img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="4.png" src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2F9c6f6512aa23845b316254af159ea628&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; border: none; width: auto; max-width: 100%;" title="1678155856892769.png"></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">&nbsp;</span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">据了解，采之汲正在对</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">10000+</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">种高功效药植进行研究，为此，还自建万亩珍稀药植园。同时，为了让药植功效更易吸收，采之汲以创新性的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">NEX</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">技术打破</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">500</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">道尔顿</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">魔咒</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，将药植转化为肽类、多糖等小分子，实现吸收突破。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">对此，采之汲研发负责人表示：</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">基础建设是采之汲靶向性护肤的坚实底座</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">&nbsp;</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">中国护肤品牌要破浪而行，要抢占先机，更要夯实根基。为此，采之汲将</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">90%</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的营销收入用于基础科研投入，打造行业基石。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">在科研方面</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">采之汲就做了诸多工作</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">比如</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">联合</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">14</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">所</span></span><a href="http://stock.jrj.com.cn/concept/conceptdetail/conceptDetail_gx.shtml" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-decoration-line: none;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">高校</span></span></a><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">与科研院所成立</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">药用植物研究实验室</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，打造东亚肌肤健康研究中心</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">；</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">立足</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">皮肤精准诊疗</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，打造兼具</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">功效原料机理研究</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">创新性配方体系</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">和</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">皮肤精准护理体系研发</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">等多功能综合研发平台。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">努力已转化为成果，凭借在基础研究和技术研发迭代方面的多年深耕，采之汲已完成</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">17</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">篇科技论文的发表，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">12</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">篇国际会议论文展示，其中</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">7</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">篇</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">SCI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">论文，获得国内外专利</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">30</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">余项</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">……</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">上述只是冰山一角，通过多年创新性布局采之汲搭建起了</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">种</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">-</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">研</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">-</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">检</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">-</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">用</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">全产业链，从原料种植、提取配方、研发测试、产品自研及标准等全面发力，构建品牌壁垒。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">从</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">1993</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">年到</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">2023</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">年，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">相隔的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">30</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">年，是</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">10950</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">天，更是</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">262800</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">小时。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">面对国际大牌的领先优势，国产品牌想要突围，不仅需要拥有洞察行业未来的远见</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">还要拥有战略定力和耐力，以便通过扎实的行业基建在快速更迭的消费市场中</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">走出一条</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">靶向性护肤</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">更优</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">护肤路径，乃至在与国际大牌的竞速中掌握</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">先手</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">主动权。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);"> &nbsp;</p>

      标题：精准护肤：被触碰到的国际大牌“软肋”
      文章内容：
                    
                    <p class="otitle">
                        （原标题：精准护肤：被触碰到的国际大牌“软肋”）
                    </p>
                    
                    <p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">电影《流浪地球</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">2</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">》</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">中，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">人工智能</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">MOSS</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">帮助人类建造行星发动机、完成月球自动化建设、负责宇航员的面试。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">现实中，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">OpenAI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">发布的语言生成模型</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">ChatGPT</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，在科技圈掀起一阵热潮，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">ChatGPT</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">所代表的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AIGC</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">模式火爆全球。</span></span><span style="font-family: 华文仿宋; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: 0px; text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">互联网行业的内容生产模式经历了</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">PGC</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">（</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">专家生产内容</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">），</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">UGC</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">（</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">用户生产内容</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">）</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，到现在</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">AIGC(AI生产内容</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">）</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。可以看到，在时代滚滚向前的进程下，智能化是一个必然的趋势。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">在</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E6%8A%A4%E8%82%A4">护肤</a>行业，也同样经历</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">着</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">类似的迭代过程</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">：</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">从专家提供护肤方案、用户搭配护肤方案、到如今</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">定制护肤方案。其中，精准护肤因能通过</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">检测人脸图像、自动分析问题、产出护肤方案而出圈，堪称护肤界</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AIGC</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">虽然，诞生西方国家的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">ChatGPT</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，拥有</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">工业革命</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">级别的能力表现，让国内互联网大厂</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">坐不住</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">了。但与之相反的是，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">由百年药企云南白药旗下采之汲主导研发</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">诞生于中国的精准护肤</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">正以</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">其</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">颠覆传统</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">突破</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">模式，让国际护肤大牌</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">集体破防</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> &nbsp;</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-align: center;"> <img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="1.png" src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2F56c007158a06650bbc17a4afa0e052ce&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; border: none; width: auto; max-width: 100%;" title="1678155258987584.png"></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">&nbsp;</span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-align: center;"> <strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">个性化定制：被触碰到的国际大牌</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">“</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">软肋</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">”</span></strong></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 29px; text-align: justify;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">&nbsp;</span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">在中国护肤市场纵横的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px;
