font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">30</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">余年中，国际大牌在凭借先发优势建立</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">游戏规则</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的传统护肤模式上，拥有对特定<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E8%82%A4%E8%B4%A8">肤质</a>、成分功效等固定护肤状态研究的技术壁垒。这样牢固且全面的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">防御体系</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，让起步较晚的国产品牌在同赛道难以赶超。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">那么，被国际大牌领跑的传统护肤，能</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">精准</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">解决消费者问题吗？</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">《中国女性护肤品使用效果调查报告》数据表明，高达</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">62.3%</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的女性表示购买的护肤品不合适，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">46%</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的人表示出现了问题，仅有</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">18.6%</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的人得到真正改善。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">搓泥不好用，淡化细纹效果不明显，不<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E6%8A%97%E8%80%81">抗老</a></span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">功效不太够，无功无过的产品。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">功效很弱，既不去黑眼圈也不去眼纹</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">使用效果不佳的消费者如是评价。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">由此可见，传统护肤的效果</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">间歇性</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">失灵，显露出国际大牌打造</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">爆款效应</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">软肋</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">：在面对独一无二的肌肤问题时，千篇一律的传统护肤品，针对性解决能力略显不足。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">与此同时，伴随护肤知识的普及、消费者生活方式以及作息规律的变化，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">更讲究产品功效</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">强调</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">护肤精细化</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">正</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">成为年轻一代消费者</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">护肤新追求。其中，更高效、更</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">科学地精准</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">护肤诉求被高频提及。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">在《</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">2021</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">东方美谷蓝皮书（化妆品行业）》中，揭示了当前国内护肤消费的五大潮流趋势，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">精准护肤</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">成为其中之一。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">采之汲</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">研发团队表示</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">精准护肤是利用多组学的研究方式，结合</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">AI</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">皮肤动态检测和肌肤大数据诊断等研究手段，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">以</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">实现个性化定制的护肤方式。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">个性化定制的精准护肤出现，将这家在</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">定制护肤领域默默耕耘多年的国产品牌，拉到了中国护肤舞台的聚光灯下。此时不少人才惊讶地发现，采之汲能推出</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">定制模式的精准护肤，并不是偶然。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 7px 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-align: justify;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 宋体; letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;</span></p> 
<p style="margin: 7px 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-align: center;"> <strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: left; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">护肤</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: left; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">“</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: left; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">大模型</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: left; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">”</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: left; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">：百万肌肤数据库的</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: left; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">“</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: left; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">含金量</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: left; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">”</span></strong></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 29px; text-align: justify;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">&nbsp;</span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">诊断问题、定制方案，可以说是护肤行业的一个</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">跨越式</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">提升。事实上，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">能力的开发与提升，并不是一蹴而就。尤其是通过</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">实现</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">精准</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">护肤，更是难上加难</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">想</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">要实现落地、走进日常，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">就</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">必须具备</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">规模化产出</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的能力。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">而精准护肤的成功在于量变产生质变：通过大而全的真实肌肤诊疗数据库，构建「诊断</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">－</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">分析</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">－</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">解决」的护肤样本</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">大模型</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">同时，数据库需突破新一代生命组学临床应用技术和生物医学大数据分析技术，建立创新性的大规模诊断、治疗与功效评价的生物标志物、靶标、制剂的实验和分析技术体系。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> &nbsp;</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-align: center;"> <img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="2.png" src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2F9ca2affed0779c451a232d9425ecc452&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; border: none; width: auto; max-width: 100%;" title="1678155267321850.png"></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);"> &nbsp;</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">相对于以西方肌肤研究为主的国际大牌，采之汲已有领先优势。据报道，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">2018</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">年采之汲便依托云南白药联合北京工商大学、北京科技大学成立的东亚肌肤健康研究中心</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">同时，打造了上万条皮肤学级诊断样本，建立</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">13</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">＋</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">AI</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">皮肤科医学诊断模型、对</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">86</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">＋多元皮肤科问题实现精准识别。结合</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">AI</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">可以分析</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">6</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">类色斑、</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">3</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">期痘型、</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">3</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">种程度炎症等数十种肌肤问题。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">拥有如此</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">含金量</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的数据库，精准护肤成为护肤圈</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">新顶流</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">也不足为奇。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">在社交平台上，抖音关于「精准护肤」的话题播放量已经达到了</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">1409.6</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">万次，小红书的笔记也超过了</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">4</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">万篇。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em; text-align: center;"> &nbsp;</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em; text-align: center;"> <strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">底层</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">“</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">技术代差</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">”</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">：用</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">AI</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">“</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">串联</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">”</span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;">的全产业链</span></strong></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">在消费升级的数字化发展环境下，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">ABCD</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">已不再是简单的字母表前四位，其代表引领未来的四大前沿技术矩阵：人工智能</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: &quot;Arial Unicode MS&quot;; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋;">(</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">Artifi</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">cial Intelligence</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: &quot;Arial Unicode MS&quot;; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋;">)</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">、区块链技术</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">（</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">BlockChain</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: &quot;Arial Unicode MS&quot;; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">）</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">、云计算</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">（</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">Cloudcomputing</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: &quot;Arial Unicode MS&quot;; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">）</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">、大数据</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">（</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">Data</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: &quot;Arial Unicode MS&quot;; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋;">)</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">如果对采之汲有过持续的追踪，大家就会发现，采之汲早已建立多功能综合研发型平台，打造结合</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">与大数据两大前沿技术的精准护肤产品开发体系。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">此外，为开发出完整的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">定制生态，采之汲打造</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">MIS AI</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">肌肤检测仪。其搭建</span>&nbsp;</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">AI</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">人体皮肤识别神经网路，通过亿万级专业像素摄像头采集肌肤信息，利用医用级光源和</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">AI</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">多维度识别分析图像并准确找出肌肤问题。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">同时，基于研究成果，在</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">2021</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">年的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">第二届东亚肌肤健康研究中心学术研讨会</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">上，采之汲与</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">IBM</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">、欧姆龙联合发布首款</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">AI</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">肌肤诊疗个性化定制系统</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">——“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">MIS-UNIQ</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> &nbsp;</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-align: center;"> <img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="3.png" src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2F893eb8fb5f30aafeefa21300a2b66b3e&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; border: none; width: auto; max-width: 100%;" title="1678155274939375.png"></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);"> &nbsp;</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">简单来说，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">可以通过深度学习的能力和数字化的定量，去分析针对皮肤动态以及从季节、地域、气候等对每个个体的影响，运用诊断分析模型与成分数据，帮助消费者定制护肤方案。而采之汲的自研全产业链也被</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">串联</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">起来。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">实际上，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">MIS-UNIQ</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">只是采之汲在精准护肤众多布局中的一个闪光点。采之汲之所以能在精准护肤领域，领先国际大牌占得先机。还离不开其对成分提取、基础技术等产业链布局，由此构成</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">定制护肤硬核的壁垒，形成与国际大牌的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">技术代差</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">据了解，云南白药自建的万亩</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">药植园</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，拥有多达</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">13000+</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">天然药用植物及成分数据库。例如，重楼原料实现</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">种源</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">-</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">种植</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">-</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">加工</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">-</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">回收</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">-</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">投料</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”&nbsp;</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的全产业链闭环生产；三七原料在云南白药数字化三七产业平台实现无土化、自动化、智慧化栽培。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">再通过</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">NEX</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">技术，研制高效能、高活性、高</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">纯度</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的药植冻干粉</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">而</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">在</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">加持下的精准护肤，定制个性化的高效护肤方案仅需</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">5</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">分钟。每个人将不再和别人一样用着差不多的成分、差不多的配方、差不多的产品与搭配。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">早在</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">2018</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">年，英敏特发布的《世界美容行业趋势》报告表示，未来，护肤行业根据消费者的年龄、性别和皮肤类型来简单划分目标的客群的传统标准将被</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">终结</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">到了如今</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">2023</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">年，采之汲</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AIGC</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">模式的精准护肤正如</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">预言</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">所说，颠覆了传统护肤模式。而当新一轮的变革来临之际，无论是国际大牌还是其他传统护肤品牌，都希望得到那张珍贵的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">入场券</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> &nbsp;</p>  
<br> 
<br> 
<span id="pe100_page_contentpage" class="pagecss"></span>
                    <div style="height: 0px;overflow:hidden;"><img src="https://static.ws.126.net/163/f2e/product/post_nodejs/static/logo.png"></div>
                
      




    
      标题：千山资本创始合伙人徐曼荣膺“融中2022年度最佳女性投资人”
      文章内容：
                    
                    <p class="otitle">
                        （原标题：千山资本创始合伙人徐曼荣膺“融中2022年度最佳女性投资人”）
                    </p>
                    
                    <p style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> 女性天生是很好的投资者。——巴菲特</p> 
<p style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> 心有猛虎,细嗅蔷薇。在投资行业中,女性投资人将这两种境界完美的融合在了一起。</p> 
<p style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; text-align: center;"> <img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="1.png" src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2F27e55467a972cd64c0b354fc1e147618&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" style="max-width: 600px;" title="1.png"></p> 
<p style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> <span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); letter-spacing: 1px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 2em;">3月7日,融资中国公布了“融中2022年度中国股权投资行业最佳女性投资人”榜单,<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/5/4/53435c71/1.html" title="千山" target="_blank">千山</a>资本创始<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E5%90%88%E4%BC%99%E4%BA%BA">合伙人</a> <a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/5/9/5f9066fc/1.html" title="徐曼" target="_blank">徐曼</a> 女士荣膺「融中2022年度最佳女性投资人」。</span></p> 
<p style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; text-align: center;"> <span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); letter-spacing: 1px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 2em;"><img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="2.png" border="0" height="405" src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2Fb94fb233f65ae9ec1fbdd65ffab46b45&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" style="max-width: 600px; width: 630px; height: 405px;" title="2.png" vspace="0" width="630"></span></p> 
<p style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"> 徐曼 女士,现任千山资本创始合伙人,任职期间,参与了<a href="http://money.163.com/baike/jingdong/" title="财经公司_京东" target="_blank">京东</a>物流(HK2618)、京东健康(HK6618)、京东科技、浪潮云、闪送、友芝友、昆仑芯、小度科技、华人运通、大普微等众多优秀企业的投融资全过程。</p> 
<p style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"> 徐曼 女士毕业于中国人民大学财政金融学院,目前长江商学院EMBA在读。</p> 
<p style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> <strong>关于千山资本：</strong></p> 
<p style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> 北京千山信远投资管理有限公司(以下简称千山信远)作为本基金的管理人,是在中国证券投资基金业协会登记备案的专业股权投资管理机构,千山信远专注于硬科技、生物医药、新能源、智能物流以及金融科技领域PE阶段投资的私募股权平台,旗下管理私募基金总规模超过40亿元人民币。&nbsp;&nbsp;</p> 
<p style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> 千山投资案例代表:昆仑芯片、小度科技、京东科技、浪潮云、大普微电子、欣巴科技、进化者机器人、京东健康、友芝友、高合汽车、京东物流、闪送、行深智能、58数科、美信联邦、百望云、京东保险、博纳影业等。</p>  
<br>
