      标题：逆势增长，百果园获2022年中国大消费CXO年度盛典“最具韧性企业”奖
      文章内容：
                    
                    <p class="otitle">
                        （原标题：逆势增长，百果园获2022年中国大消费CXO年度盛典“最具韧性企业”奖）
                    </p>
                    
                    <p style="margin: 0px 0px 1.6rem; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Lucida Grande&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, FreeSans, Arimo, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;wenquanyi micro hei&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, FontAwesome, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em; text-align: justify;"> 近日，中国大消费<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=CXO">CXO</a>创新中心、中国轻工企业投资发展协会主办的“2023年中国大消费CXO年度盛典”于上海圆满落幕。本次盛典活动围绕“韧性·创新·温度”主题，邀请行业大咖把脉经济发展动向。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 1.6rem; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Lucida Grande&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, FreeSans, Arimo, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;wenquanyi micro hei&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, FontAwesome, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em; text-align: justify;"> 席间，国内最大的<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/6/3/6c34679c/1.html" title="水果" target="_blank">水果</a>连锁零售企业<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E7%99%BE%E6%9E%9C%E5%9B%AD">百果园</a>，在一众经济学家、投资机构决策者、品牌方决策者及行业专家的见证下，荣获“2022年中国大消费最具韧性企业“称号。在受宏观经济增速放缓以及疫情等因素影响下，百果园依然逆势发展，背后是企业综合实力和企业创新拼搏精神的体现。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 1.6rem; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Lucida Grande&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, FreeSans, Arimo, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;wenquanyi micro hei&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, FontAwesome, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 0em; text-align: center;"> <img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="" border="0" height="387" src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2F09e4560aa1939a2da5a4f4f4d9d4ab3c&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" style="margin: 0px; height: 387px; max-width: 100%; width: 580px;" title="" vspace="0" width="580"></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 1.6rem; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Lucida Grande&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, FreeSans, Arimo, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;wenquanyi micro hei&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, FontAwesome, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em; text-align: justify;"> 今年1月，百果园成功登陆港交所主板，创立的二十余年时间里，凭借领先的分销网络和扩张速度，百果园在全国铺设了5600余家门店，遍及全国22个省市的140多个城市，主要集中在居民区、商业街等高人流量区位。据其招股书显示，百果园目前已经做到了中国第一大水果零售商的位置，占中国总市场份额超1.0%。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 1.6rem; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Lucida Grande&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, FreeSans, Arimo, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;wenquanyi micro hei&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, FontAwesome, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em; text-align: justify;"> 近几年，受疫情影响，国内部分行业线下实体持续承压。在刚需、高频消费的水果零售行业，百果园跑出了自己的路径。从品类品牌、渠道品牌建设等方面发力，纵然在不确定性因素下，百果园的规模仍稳中有升，业务版图也在持续扩大。过去三年新增门店千家，以逆势增长的姿态为整个经济市场注入了信心与活力。据其财务数据显示，2019年至2021年，百果园的营收分别为89.76亿元、88.54亿元和102.89 亿元；其中，2021年百果园营收首次突破百亿元的大关；2022年上半年，百果园的营收较2021年同期的55.25亿元增加7.0%至59.15亿元，业绩继续稳中有升。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 1.6rem; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Lucida Grande&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, FreeSans, Arimo, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;wenquanyi micro hei&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, FontAwesome, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em; text-align: justify;"> 数据背后是百果园多年来一直修炼的“内功”。通过做重供应链，保证水果的品质及稳定供应；通过数字化赋能产业链到门店端再到顾客端，达到提质增效，让顾客、员工、加盟商满意的目的。产业生态的布局，看似过程漫长，实则稳健扎实，也增加了企业抗风险能力。随着经济稳步复苏，百果园也将通过高质量发展，给市场和行业带来更多惊喜。</p>  
<br> 
<br> 
<span id="pe100_page_contentpage" class="pagecss"></span>
                    <div style="height: 0px;overflow:hidden;"><img src="https://static.ws.126.net/163/f2e/product/post_nodejs/static/logo.png"></div>
                
      




    
      标题：国内最大的一站式宠物医疗平台，新瑞鹏迎合市场脱颖而出
      文章内容：
                    
                    <p class="otitle">
                        （原标题：国内最大的一站式宠物医疗平台，新瑞鹏迎合市场脱颖而出）
                    </p>
                    
                    <p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> 随着<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/5/a/5ba07269/1.html" title="宠物" target="_blank">宠物</a>经济的持续发展，越来越多的宠物企业正酝酿上市。近日，乖宝和福贝先后提交上市申请，<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E5%AE%A0%E7%89%A9%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97">宠物医疗</a>行业巨头<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E6%96%B0%E7%91%9E%E9%B9%8F">新瑞鹏</a>也于年初交表，属于宠物经济的、蓬勃发展的时代正在到来。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> 据了解，新瑞鹏拥有宠物医疗服务、供应链服务和本地生活服务这三大业务板块，并已延伸发展出第三方诊断、兽医继续教育和行业级企业服务等其他业务板块。新瑞鹏在宠物医疗服务行业耕耘已逾20年，是中国<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/7/c/7ecf8425/1.html" title="经营" target="_blank">经营</a>时间最长的全国性连锁<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E5%AE%A0%E7%89%A9%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2">宠物医院</a>运营商。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> <strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">宠物市场前景可期</strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">&nbsp;</strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">新瑞</strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">鹏积极</strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">把握机遇</strong></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> 宠物医疗服务是新瑞鹏业绩的一个突出亮点。根据相关资料，2020年及2021年，新瑞鹏是中国最大、全球第二大的宠物医疗服务平台（就医院数目及宠物医疗服务收入而言）。截至2022年9月30日，新瑞鹏在中国经营最广泛的宠物医院网络，拥有1,942家宠物医院，覆盖31个省份及114个城市。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> 中国的宠物市场拥有相当大的消费潜力，这对于新瑞鹏而言是一个非常好的机遇和挑战。据了解，中国的宠物医疗服务市场虽然高度分散，但是就宠物医疗服务收入而言，新瑞鹏拥有9.8%的领先宠物护理市场份额，大于排名第二至第十的竞争对手的市场份额总和。另外，就宠物相关支出而言，中国是全球第二大宠物市场。中国宠物医疗市场由2015年的人民币200亿元快速增长至2021年的人民币545亿元，复合年增长率约为18.2%。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> <strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">吸纳人才、提高技术、整合收购</strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">&nbsp;</strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">新瑞鹏在行动</strong></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> 从团队建设、人才培养等方面来看，新瑞鹏已经做好充分准备把握中国宠物医疗的庞大机遇。截至2021年12月31日，新瑞鹏建立了由超过5,200名高素质和经验丰富的兽医组成的人才库，由占业内60%以上兽医专家的专家团队带领。同时，新瑞鹏是中国宠物医疗专业服务的开拓者，并运营中国为数不多的涵盖全系列15大宠物专科疾病的宠物医院网络之一。在丰富的人才资源与医学技术的推动下，新瑞鹏能够以优质的宠物医疗服务快速及有机地扩展客户群。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> 在20多年的发展过程中，新瑞鹏积极参与了中国宠物医疗行业的整合历程。新瑞鹏拥有多元化的品牌组合，涵盖宠物医疗门类的所有范畴，并凭借该等品牌服务多类宠物及其宠物主人。据了解，截至2021年12月31日，新瑞鹏拥有中国前20 大宠物医疗服务品牌中的13个品牌，大规模的整合也使其成为宠物医疗赛道的稀缺标的。做为宠物医疗服务首选品牌，新瑞鹏受到中国宠物主人的广泛推崇。此外，2021年，新瑞鹏在宠物医疗服务方面的客户复购率维持在约56%，远超行业平均值。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> 除此之外，新瑞鹏在执行和整合收购以实现协同效应方面拥有良好往绩，在高度分散的中国宠物医疗行业中，新瑞鹏已成为独立宠物诊所的首选资深收购者。自2019年起，新瑞鹏收购了超过1,290家宠物医院。新瑞鹏的规模和品牌知名度带来了大量忠实的客户和庞大的患者案例数据库，有助于对宠物及宠物主人行为形成深入的了解。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-indent: 2em;"> 面对可观的市场机遇，相信新瑞鹏能够铆足动力、乘风而上，在宠物赛道中迈向一个新台阶。新瑞鹏本次在国际资本市场的亮相，无疑将进一步提升其企业知名度，也将为企业发展掀开了新的历史篇章。</p>  
<br> 
<br> 
<span id="pe100_page_contentpage" class="pagecss"></span>
                    <div style="height: 0px;overflow:hidden;"><img src="https://static.ws.126.net/163/f2e/product/post_nodejs/static/logo.png"></div>
                
      




    
      标题：“画线派”老将打造，国投瑞银比较优势一年持有期基金3月7日首发
      文章内容：
                    
                    <p class="otitle">
                        （原标题：“画线派”老将打造，国投瑞银比较优势一年持有期基金3月7日首发）
                    </p>
                    
                    在<a href="http://money.163.com/baike/ashares/" title="财经知识_A股" target="_blank">A股</a>市场，震荡常有，追求稳健回报与绝对收益是大部分投资人的期望。2022年以来，A股大起大落，沪指既站上过3600点阶段性高点，也曾两次跌破3000点，投资热点来回切换，板块轮动此起彼伏……行情复杂多变之下，投资若选择与优秀的<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/5/f/57fa91d1/1.html" title="基金" target="_blank">基金</a>经理同行，更有望收获较为舒适的投资体验。（数据来源于Wind，截至2022.12.31。）
<br> &nbsp;
<br> <a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/5/f/56fd6295/1.html" title="国投" target="_blank">国投</a>瑞银綦<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/7/1/7f1a9e4f/1.html" title="缚鹏" target="_blank">缚鹏</a>便是这样一位实力出众的基金经理。“我追求的投资目标是策略透明，让基金持有人有相对明确的收益预期，无论是在牛市还是熊市，都不需要太操心。”綦缚鹏表示。3月7日起，拟由綦缚鹏担纲管理的
<strong>国投瑞银比较优势一年<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E6%8C%81%E6%9C%89%E6%9C%9F">持有期</a>基金</strong>全新首发，助力投资者布局2023年行情。
<br> &nbsp;
<br> 据悉，国投瑞银比较优势的投资目标是在严格控制风险的前提下，通过股票与债券等资产的合理配置，精选在市场竞争中具备比较优势的优质<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/8/c/8bc15238/1.html" title="证券" target="_blank">证券</a>，力争基金资产的持续稳健增值。
<br> &nbsp;
<br> 作为“长跑型选手”，綦缚鹏致力于为持有人提供“减震”的投资体验，在追求绝对收益的同时兼顾相对收益，并主动管理回撤，打造高性价比基金，与持有人共赢。公开资料显示，基金经理綦缚鹏为东北财经大学工商管理硕士，拥有20年证券从业经历，12年公募基金管理经验。2009年4月，綦缚鹏加入国投瑞银基金，现任国投瑞银瑞利、国投瑞银瑞源、国投瑞银远见成长、国投瑞银行业睿选共4只产品的基金经理。基金定期报告显示，截至2022年12月31日，綦缚鹏在管总规模62亿元。
<br> &nbsp;
<br> 由于綦缚鹏管理时间较久的产品的历史回撤想对较小，净值走势图“画”出了稳健曲线，故也被称作“画线派”基金经理。其管理时间较长的国投瑞银瑞利A与国投瑞银瑞源A两个产品，回报优异，走势稳健。Wind数据显示，截至2022年12月31日，国投瑞银瑞利A与国投瑞银瑞源A自成立以来分别为投资者带来了120.46%与45.21%的超额收益。与此同时，由于綦缚鹏从业时间较长，已经完整经历过牛熊考验，故其业绩更加有说服力。
<br> &nbsp; 
<div style="text-align: center;"> 
 <img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="" src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2F35fa08c85ae311ad21fb968f18bca227&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" style="width: 550px; height: 157px;"></div> 
<div style="text-align: center;">
  数据来源：Wind、基金季报，截至2022年12月31日
</div> &nbsp;
<br> 在行业配置上，綦缚鹏不押注单一行业或公司，而是通过长期前景、短周期景气、估值确定行业权重。在行业配置权重约束下，兼顾景气和估值，再以合理价格买入龙头公司。从国投瑞银瑞利的配置情况来看，基金定期报告显示，截至2022年12月31日，国投瑞银瑞利行业与个股均分散配置，前5大行业占比大部分时间低于40%，前10大个股占比大部分时间低于40%。
<br> &nbsp;
<br> 净值波动过大，投资者的体验就会欠佳，所以綦缚鹏非常注重风险管理和回撤。在面临市场震荡时，綦缚鹏主要通过两个方法主动管理回撤，其一是对仓位进行前瞻性调整，其二是对持仓进行结构性调整，力争实现区间回报与投资者追求的投资回报相匹配。从动态回撤数据来看，綦缚鹏管理的产品回撤表现远优于中证800。譬如，2021年初至2022年末，中证800最大回撤为-33.96%，同期业绩基准为-20.24%，国投瑞银瑞利A仅为-12.77%，体现了綦缚鹏优秀的回撤控制能力。
<br> &nbsp;
<br> 值得关注的是，国投瑞银比较优势是綦缚鹏职业生涯的首只一年持有期产品，能够更有效规避短期博弈，专注长期投资价值。首先，随着持有时间的加长，基金的平均收益会随之提高，能够减缓权益资产带来的波动，提升持有者的盈利体验。其次，一年持有期的设置，既能帮助投资者建立长期投资理念，规避“追涨杀跌”的短期博弈，又有助于基金经理提高资金利用率，专注挖掘长期价值。
<br> &nbsp;
<br> 展望后市，綦缚鹏认为，2022年制约权益市场表现的三个核心因素，疫情、房地产与强势美元都在2022年四季度出现了边际变化，2023年出现改善是较为明确的，不确定的只是幅度和节奏，2023年值得期待。
<br> &nbsp;
<br> &nbsp;
<br> 
<strong><em>风险提示：</em></strong>
<br> 1，市场有风险，投资须谨慎，基金投资不保证本金不受损失，不保证一定盈利，投资需谨慎。以上观点仅代表作者个人意见，不代表基金公司立场，也不构成对阅读者的投资建议。文章内容仅供研究和学习使用，所涉及的股票、基金等均不构成任何投资建议。
<br> 2，基金阶段回报中：基金业绩数据及业绩基准源于2022年4季度报告，排名及同类平均源于银河证券，截至2022年12月31日。国投瑞银瑞利A同类基金指银河证券分类中混合基金-灵活配置型基金-灵活配置型基金(股票比例30%-60%)(A类);国投瑞银瑞源A同类基金指银河证券分类中混合基金-偏股型基金-偏股型基金(股票上限80%)(A类)。国投瑞银瑞利混合(LOF)成立于2015年2月5日，基缚鹏自2016年7月26日起任职，2018年-2022年基金及其准收益率分别为-15.86%/-11.03%,37.71%/17.99%,39.88%/13.50%,28.51%/-1.21%,-4.38%/-10.80%；国投瑞银瑞源成立于2015年1月22日，该基金自2018年1月23日由保本基金转型为灵活配置型证券投资基金，基金经理李怡文任职期间为2011/12/20-2019/2/1，基金经理董晗任职期间为2016/1/19-2020/7/17，基缚鹏自2020年7月10日起任职，2018年-2022年基金及基准收益率分别:-4.93%/-22.95%,36.27%/19.75%,54.20%/14.87%,28.16%/-1.58%,-3.99%/-11.90%;国投瑞银远见成长混合A/C成立于2020年12月17日，基金经理孙文龙任职期间为2020/12/17-2021/12/30，綦缚鹏自2021年12月23日起任职，2020-2022年A/C基金及基准收益率分别为：0.16%/0.14%/3.57%,-2.74%/-3.12%/-2.81%,-7.07%/-7.45%/-14.67%。国投瑞银行业睿选成立于2022年9月7日，因成立未满半年，故不披露业绩。评级数据源于银河证券及海通证券，截至2022年12月31日。国投瑞银瑞利业绩比较基准为沪深300 指数收益率x50%+中债综合指数收益率x50%;国投瑞银瑞源业绩比较基准为沪深300指数收益率x55%+中债综合指数收益率x45%。银河评级、海通评级源于银河证券和海通证券，截至2022年12日31日。
<br> 风险提示：国投瑞银比较优势一年持有期混合型证券投资基金的风险等级为中风险（R3）。投资有风险，请谨慎选择。基金过往业绩并不预示其未来表现，基金管理人管理的其他基金的业绩也不构成本基金业绩表现的保证。我国基金运作时间较短，不能反映资本市场发展所有阶段。请仔细阅读《基金合同》、《招募说明书》、《基金产品资料概要》及相关公告。请投资者做好风险测评，并根据您的风险承受能力选择与之相匹配的风险等级的基金产品。定期定额投资不等于零存整取的储蓄品种，有损失本金的风险，投资者应充分了解基金定期定额投资和零存整取等储蓄方式的区别。本基金如果投资港股通标的股票，需承担汇率风险以及境外市场的风险。本基金由国投瑞银基金管理有限公司发行与管理，代销机构不承担产品的投资、兑付和风险管理责任。
<br> &nbsp;
<br> &nbsp;

      标题：减费让利支付便民，助商惠民送福到家
      文章内容：
                    
                    <p class="otitle">
                        （原标题：减费让利支付便民，助商惠民送福到家）
                    </p>
                    
                    <p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: 1.2em; word-break: normal; overflow-wrap: break-word; max-width: 100%; line-height: 1.8em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-indent: 2em; font-family: &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Open Sans&quot;, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeiti, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, SimSun, sans-serif; text-align: justify;"> 近年来，中国<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/9/f/94f68054/1.html" title="银联" target="_blank">银联</a>携手成员机构，积极响应国家减费让利政策，认真贯彻落实人民银行关于助力<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E5%B0%8F%E5%BE%AE%E4%BC%81%E4%B8%9A">小微企业</a>等市场主体的各项工作部署，持续采取多项减费让利措施减轻市场主体成本负担。同时，紧贴百姓日常消费需求，在商超、百货、餐饮、家电、文旅等重点民生领域开展消费<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/6/e/60e06c11/1.html" title="惠民" target="_blank">惠民</a>活动，激发实体经济活力，促进消费回暖企稳。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: 1.2em; word-break: normal; overflow-wrap: break-word; max-width: 100%; line-height: 1.8em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-indent: 2em; font-family: &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Open Sans&quot;, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeiti, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, SimSun, sans-serif; text-align: justify;"> 减费让利支持商户降本增效</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: 1.2em; word-break: normal; overflow-wrap: break-word; max-width: 100%; line-height: 1.8em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-indent: 2em; font-family: &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Open Sans&quot;, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeiti, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, SimSun, sans-serif; text-align: justify;"> 自2021年9月30日起，银联联合发卡银行持续实施银行卡刷卡手续费优惠。截至目前，相关减费让利措施覆盖银联网络内逾千家成员机构，惠及逾千万商户，有效降低小微企业等市场主体支付成本。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: 1.2em; word-break: normal; overflow-wrap: break-word; max-width: 100%; line-height: 1.8em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-indent: 2em; font-family: &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Open Sans&quot;, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeiti, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, SimSun, sans-serif; text-align: justify;"> 此外，银联携手商业银行等机构持续开展“红火计划”，对商户收款交易实行激励，有效帮助商户降低经营成本，受到商户的广泛欢迎。“红火计划”自开展以来，合作机构已达58家，覆盖全国逾1000万商户。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: 1.2em; word-break: normal; overflow-wrap: break-word; max-width: 100%; line-height: 1.8em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-indent: 2em; font-family: &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Open Sans&quot;, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeiti, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, SimSun, sans-serif; text-align: justify;"> 消费优惠服务用户送福到家</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: 1.2em; word-break: normal; overflow-wrap: break-word; max-width: 100%; line-height: 1.8em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-indent: 2em; font-family: &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Open Sans&quot;, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeiti, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, SimSun, sans-serif; text-align: justify;"> 开春以来，现金存取、转账等服务也迎来需求高峰。中国银联会同商业银行向消费者提供便捷安全的现金服务，持续实施降低ATM跨行取现业务、减免小微企业卡及单位结算卡跨行转账汇款交易银联手续费等措施。今年新春，银联在确保支付服务畅通的同时，开展“用银联 纳百福”活动，为广大消费者准备了六大福礼和丰富多彩的“福”字主题特色活动。各地消费者可享受覆盖“衣、食、住、行、游”以及富有地方特色的优惠体验。</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: 1.2em; word-break: normal; overflow-wrap: break-word; max-width: 100%; line-height: 1.8em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-indent: 2em; font-family: &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Open Sans&quot;, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeiti, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, SimSun, sans-serif; text-align: justify;"> 百城百区特色活动促进文旅产业复苏</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: 1.2em; word-break: normal; overflow-wrap: break-word; max-width: 100%; line-height: 1.8em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-indent: 2em; font-family: &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Open Sans&quot;, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeiti, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, SimSun, sans-serif; text-align: justify;"> 文化和旅游部与中国银联联合发布“百城百区”文化和旅游消费助企惠民行动，进一步优化文化和旅游消费惠民措施，促进文旅消费复苏。截至目前，已涵盖107个国家文化和旅游消费示范城市及试点城市、122个国家级夜间文化和旅游消费集聚区。</p>  
<br> 
<br> 
<span id="pe100_page_contentpage" class="pagecss"></span>
                    <div style="height: 0px;overflow:hidden;"><img src="https://static.ws.126.net/163/f2e/product/post_nodejs/static/logo.png"></div>
                
      




    
      标题：用产品和服务凝聚用户！讯飞智能办公本为职场高端人士创造更多价值
      文章内容：
                    
                    <p class="otitle">
                        （原标题：用产品和服务凝聚用户！讯飞智能办公本为职场高端人士创造更多价值）
                    </p>
                    
                    <p> 近日，<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/8/a/8baf98de/1.html" title="讯飞" target="_blank">讯飞</a>智能办公本携手吴晓波频道，在广州举办了讯飞智能办公本莫比俱乐部的第二场用户活动。</p><p> 本次活动聚焦于用户在<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/8/4/804c573a/1.html" title="职场" target="_blank">职场</a>价值、管理能力提升等方面的需求，特别邀约了吴晓波频道的两位重磅导师嘉宾：熊小年、张勇进行现场分享，助推讯飞智能办公本的用户们在职场进阶、企业管理领域高效提升。</p><p></p><p class="f_center"> <img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="用产品和服务凝聚用户！讯飞智能办公本为职场高端人士创造更多价值" src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2Fc1336bdd25a9814242683a2651d0753e&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" style="max-width: 500px;"></p><p></p><p> 一直以来，讯飞智能办公本致力为职场高端人士提供便捷高效的开会办公体验，同时它也在不断拓展用户服务的边界，探索多种用户活动形式，为用户们提供更多职场能力相关的知识干货及高价值商业资讯。</p><p> 作为智能办公领域的明星产品，讯飞智能办公本为职场高精尖人群创造了多元一体的高效工作解决方案。比如，在职场人开会时，讯飞智能办公本能够将会议进行全程录音，并且将会议内容实时转写成文字。当会议结束时，完整的会议记录也自动生成了，并且能在办公本上直接进行编辑排版，节省了大量的时间精力。它还有手写功能，墨水屏搭配电磁笔带来纸感手写体验，能够很好满足习惯手写记录的用户需要。</p><p> 除此之外，它能实时翻译7种外语，识别转写12种方言，助力用户们游刃有余的切换不同的会议场合。为了给差旅用户带来更轻松的办公体验，它还具备WPS编辑批注、收发邮件、投屏等多重功能，纤薄便携的设计，无论用户是日常办公还是出差使用，都能高效轻松的处理工作事务，显著提升工作效能。</p><p></p><p class="f_center"> <img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="用产品和服务凝聚用户！讯飞智能办公本为职场高端人士创造更多价值" src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2Fb91899ab6c6e6f28f4eea5311a8b6394&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" style="max-width: 500px;"></p><p></p><p> 从功能上来说，讯飞智能办公本对于基本的办公需求都能实现全满足、全覆盖，让职场高端人士真正的实现高效办公，并达到事半功倍的工作效果，因此讯飞智能办公本也成了众多精英人群的选择，成为出席重要会议标配的办公工具。</p><p> 产品层面，讯飞智能办公本为用户们提供高效办公的硬件支持；在服务上，它也善于站在用户角度，深度洞察用户需求。例如，以职场中高层、企业家、创业者为核心用户的智能办公本，发现了用户们对前沿商业干货知识的需要，即成立了莫比俱乐部用户活动平台，旨在聚拢高价值商业资讯，通过一系列高质量用户活动，为用户提供高价值的商业管理知识。</p><p> href="http://money.163.com/baike/shalong/" title="财经人物_阿里埃勒·沙龙" target="_blank">沙龙</a>等多种形式，为用户提供更多维度的高质量活动，感恩回馈用户的支持。</p><p>       标题：臭宝螺蛳粉火锅上线，引领行业品类创新热点
      文章内容：
                    
                    <p class="otitle">
                        （原标题：臭宝螺蛳粉火锅上线，引领行业品类创新热点）
                    </p>
                    
                    <p> 根据柳州市商务局统计，2022年1月至10月，柳州<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E8%9E%BA%E8%9B%B3%E7%B2%89">螺蛳粉</a>全产业链销售收入达到483.71亿元，同比增长16.48%，其中袋装柳州螺蛳粉153亿元，同比增长21.65%，螺蛳粉产业保持良好态势。“网红流量”转化为“发展增量”，离不开品牌、渠道、供应链等多维度的建设推进，更需要产品创新的核心驱动。近日，螺蛳粉品牌臭宝推出行业首款螺蛳粉<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/7/6/706b9505/1.html" title="火锅" target="_blank">火锅</a>，为螺蛳粉产品创新提供了新方向。</p><p> 随着螺蛳粉从猎奇单品进化为日常刚需，消费者已不再满足于常规吃法，在“万物皆可螺蛳粉”的花式吃法中，螺蛳粉火锅最受消费者青睐。然而消费者直接用螺蛳粉DIY火锅时难以把握兑水比例，存在口味不浓郁、不稳定的痛点。市面上的螺蛳粉火锅底料多为单一螺蛳粉<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/6/6/6c645e95/1.html" title="汤底" target="_blank">汤底</a>，还未有融合螺蛳粉与火锅风味、自带丰富食材、可常温长保的螺蛳粉火锅产品。</p><p></p><p class="f_center"> <img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="臭宝螺蛳粉火锅上线，引领行业品类创新热点" _src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2Fc231f3928b393a7241bf5d3816699a89&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" src="https://crawl.ws.126.net/nbot2/img/c231f3928b393a7241bf5d3816699a89" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; border: none; width: auto; max-width: 100%;"></p><p></p><p> 臭宝一起臭臭螺蛳粉火锅，创新性地将鲜辣酸爽的螺蛳粉与醇香浓郁的牛油火锅融合，与香臭酸笋、爆辣红油、酸浓香醋构成可以喝的超浓郁螺蛳粉火锅汤底，涮菜挂汁入味，久涮不淡，无需蘸料，真正意义上为消费者提供嗦螺蛳粉与涮火锅的双重快乐。此外，一起臭臭螺蛳粉火锅延续臭宝“爆有料”的核心产品价值主张，自带与螺蛳粉火锅口味融合度高的7种荤菜8种<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/7/2/7d2083dc/1.html" title="素菜" target="_blank">素菜</a>，包括极具柳州风味特色的虎皮鸭掌，以及虎皮凤爪、午餐肉、丸子、响铃卷、菌菇蔬菜等基于用户需求及市场调研筛选人气火锅食材。一袋配齐螺蛳粉火锅的底料与食材，免洗免切免调味，可实现常温长保，解决消费者堂食排队时间长、自购食材备菜工序繁琐、冰箱储藏空间不足等一系列的烦恼，为“懒人”和“小白”提供一站式便携体验，也将螺蛳粉的消费场景从一人食的解馋过瘾，升级为家庭、好友聚餐的尽兴满足。</p><p> 从大块<a href="https://money.163.com/keywords/9/4/914d83dc/1.html" title="配菜" target="_blank">配菜</a>、大片腐竹的配菜工艺革新，到与王老吉联名打造“左右凉茶、右手嗦粉”的品类场景创新，臭宝用不断创新的螺蛳粉为消费者带去味蕾刺激和趣味体验。此次推出业内首款螺蛳粉火锅，打造“涮着嗦”的奇趣新吃法，拓展“一起臭臭”的分享式消费场景，进一步深化螺蛳粉社交属性，实现品类的突破，持续以创新推动螺蛳粉行业发展，走向长红。</p>
                    <div style="height: 0px;overflow:hidden;"><img src="https://static.ws.126.net/163/f2e/product/post_nodejs/static/logo.png"></div>
                
      




    
      标题：采之汲精准护肤：护肤界的AIGC
      文章内容：
                    
                    <p class="otitle">
                        （原标题：采之汲精准护肤：护肤界的AIGC）
                    </p>
                    
                    <p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">据《中国女性<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E6%8A%A4%E8%82%A4">护肤</a>品使用效果调查报告》数据显示，高达</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">62.3%</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的女性表示购买的护肤品不合适，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">46%</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的人表示使用时肌肤出现了问题。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 29px; text-align: justify;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">&nbsp;</span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">800</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">多一瓶的国际大牌，说是专利<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E7%A5%9B%E7%97%98">祛痘</a>，怎么越涂痘痘越红。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">上千元买的进口贵妇级<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E6%8A%97%E8%A1%B0">抗衰</a><a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E9%9D%A2%E9%9C%9C">面霜</a>，涂了就跟没涂一样。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”……</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-align: center;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">&nbsp;</span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em; text-align: center;"> <strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">护肤觉醒时代：</span></span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">吃力</span></span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的国际大牌与</span></span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">挑剔</span></span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的护肤后浪</span></span></strong></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">不是国际大牌不好，而是肌肤的复杂性，远超平常人想象</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">市面上</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">大多</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">教程</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">、分享</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">仅能</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">触及护肤理论表层。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">而</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">皮肤作为人体最大的器官，其表型不仅受基因的影响因人而异，同时也受</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">如</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">地域、空气、光照等</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">外部</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">环境的影响，使</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">得</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">皮肤呈现出不同的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">情绪状态</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">在</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">没有专业的仪器辅助以及系统的长期学习，护肤后浪们</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">是</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">很难<a target="_blank" href="https://news.163.com/news/search?keyword=%E7%B2%BE%E5%87%86">精准</a>洞察肌肤更深层次的问题</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">在此背景下，即使国际大牌的成分研究成果，已经远超市场上</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">99%</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的产品，但在护肤后浪们</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">一肌一方</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的个性化护肤诉求面前，仍会稍显</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">吃力</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> &nbsp;</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-align: center;"> <img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="1.png" src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2F197300facbebfc9ed6aad275b238802d&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; border: none; width: auto; max-width: 100%;" title="1678153316818956.png"></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">&nbsp;</span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em; text-align: center;"> <strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">采之汲用数字</span></span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">读懂</span></span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span></strong><strong style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 21px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">肌肤语言</span></span></strong></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">让</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">消费者通过</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">提升</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">自身</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">皮肤认知，实现精准护肤的目的是很难的。但企业可以。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">过去，由于科技的限制，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">一肌一方</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的实现需要依托于专业的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">皮肤人才</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">或者专家。而</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">对于企业来说，这</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">也</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">意味着大量的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">人力投入</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。而即使有</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">庞大的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">皮肤专家群</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">也</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">很难</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">匹及</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">市场</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">需求</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">而</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">随着</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">技术的成熟，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">对于人力和检查精准性的困扰得以缓解</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。一方面，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">具备更大的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">脑容量</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">和</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">24小时超长运转的特点，能够解决供需矛盾</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">；另一方面，企业可以通过</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">数据模型</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">出具标准化、</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">精准</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">化</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">护肤</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">方案。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> &nbsp;</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-align: center;"> <img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="2.png" src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2Fa4cc467842d0dfb38a969925494eb857&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; border: none; width: auto; max-width: 100%;" title="1678153400743717.png"></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">&nbsp;</span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">想象一下，在对你进行全脸扫描、获取你的脸部信息后，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">将其转化成一连串数字代码，与自身数据库中的数据模型进行比对</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">然后通过诊断模型，给出肌肤问题的精准判断结果，并生成相应的产品搭配方案</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 华文仿宋; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">……</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">显然，整个过程中，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">肌肤数据模型</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">与</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">诊断模型</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">是</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">读懂</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">肌肤语言的基础，也是整个产品搭配方案的基础</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">而两者质量又由</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">底层的数据库</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">数据质量</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">决定。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 29px; text-align: justify;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">&nbsp;</span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">据了解，云南白药采之汲联合国内外知名院校建立</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">东亚肌肤健康研究中心</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，深度研究</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">国密级</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">东亚皮肤学大数据，并以此为基础开发了</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">百万真人</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">皮肤</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">科</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">数据库。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">相对欧美</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">人</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，亚洲</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">人</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">皮肤表皮层更薄</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">、</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">更敏感、更容易晒黑</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">想要生成更精准的护肤方案，就必须以东亚女性的肌肤数据为基础，搭建相关的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">精准护肤体系</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">如果以欧美女性肌肤数据</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">为</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">基础，就会南辕北辙。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">与此同时，为了精确判断消费者肌肤问题，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">采之汲</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">研发团队深度整合</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">数据库，建立</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">86+</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">多元皮肤科问题模型，以及</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">13+AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">皮肤科医学诊断模型，并以此为基础打造了</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">“</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">肌肤诊疗个性化定制系统</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">”——</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">MIS-UNIQ</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">不同于肉眼观测，</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">MIS-UNIQ</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">拥有</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">IBM</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">智能识别技术，以及</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">OMRON</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">的</span></span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">AI</span><span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">智能传感技术，可以深入肌肤底层提取关键信息，并通过诊断模型与皮肤问题模型进行比对，生成更为全面、精准的肌肤检测报告。</span></span></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-indent: 2em;"> &nbsp;</p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-align: center;"> <img onerror="javascript:this.style.opacity = 0;" alt="3.png" src="https://nimg.ws.126.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrawl.ws.126.net%2Fnbot2%2Fimg%2F09f3b0d61fe16f3712492a0b169fbc79&amp;thumbnail=660x2147483647&amp;quality=80&amp;type=jpg" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; border: none; width: auto; max-width: 100%;" title="1678153416270757.png"></p> 
<p style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);"> <span dir="LTR" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; letter-spacing: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 15px;">&nbsp;</span></p>
